title: Home page
descriptionHtml: Reima on tunnettu laadukkaista lasten ulkovaatteista. Verkkokauppamme valikoimista löydät säänkestävät vaatteet 0-12-vuotiaille lapsille, kaikkiin vuodenaikoihin. Löydät haalarit-kategoriastamme satoja värikkäitä haalareita vauvoille, taaperoille, leikki-ikäisille lapsille ja koululaisille. Lasten housut -tuoteryhmään on koottu ulkoiluhousuja joka lähtöön. On trendikästä housua, tyköistuvaa housua sekä kovaan kulutukseen tarkoitettuja erikoiskestäviä housuja. Sadepäivän lätäkköleikkeihin sopivat varusteet löydät omalta sivultaan: lasten sadevaatteet. Löydät sieltä mm. sadeasut, kurahanskat, sadetakit ja kurahousut.

seo.title: Baby Outdoor Gear & Clothing | Reima US
seo.description: At Reima, we specialize in outdoor clothing for babies and infants! Our gear is comfortable and made with little ones in mind. Shop online today!

Cute toddlers' swimsuit. Stretchy, quick-drying and breathable. High UV protection. This adorable toddlers' swimsuit is designed for the beach! Made from a stretchy SunProof material, it feels comfortable and gives effective protection from the rays with its UV 50+ factor. The elasticated lining on the front of the piece lends added comfort for little swimmers. A cute frill at the back and sides decorates this quick-drying swimsuit for kids.

Babies' booties with lightweight wadding and a fleece lining.These lovely babies' booties are ideal for chilly winter days out in the pram. They have wadding and a soft fleece lining on the inside. Match them with adorable Talvik mittens to complete the look!

Babies' first step shoes made from a flexible material. They have a sturdy heel and plenty of room for wriggly toes. Easy to put on. Can you hear the sounds of small steps? Reima's new first step shoes are designed especially for the little ones who are taking their first steps. These babies' shoes soles are flexible and allow the foot to develop normally. Rubber soles give good grip, cause the first steps matter the most.

Adjustable and ultra lightweight kids' sunhat for everyday wear. Includes a high level of UV protection. A key accessory in sunny weather, this lighter kids' hat with no lining is made from a stretchy material that has a UV 50+ protection factor. The visor protect the face while the back brim keeps the neck out of the sun.

These babies' mittens come with lightweight wadding and a fleece lining. These lovely babies' mittens are ideal for chilly winter days out in the pram. They have a padded soft fleece lining for extra warmth. Match them with our adorable Tepasto booties to complete the look!

UV-protective, quick-drying and breathable toddlers' swim shirt. Designed to make the fun last even longer at the beach! An eco-friendly choice. Our SunProof toddlers' T-shirt is made from a UV 50+ fabric for effective protection against harmful rays all the way to the elbows. The longer back hem covers the lower back, too. The stretchy material dries quickly and can be worn both for swimming and playing in the sun. This item from our range of toddler clothes is designed to make fun at the beach last even longer! This is also an ecological choice, as part of the fiber content comes from used PET beverage bottles.

UV-protective, quick-drying and breathable toddlers' swim shirt. Designed to make the fun last even longer at the beach! Our SunProof toddlers' T-shirt is made from a UV 50+ fabric for effective protection against harmful rays all the way to the elbows. The longer back hem covers the lower back, too. The stretchy material dries quickly and can be worn both for swimming and playing in the sun. This item from our range of toddler clothes is designed to make fun at the beach last even longer!

Highly protective toddlers' sunhat with advanced UV coverage. Has a long, wide brim and stylish visor. A toddlers' hat is a key accessory for sunny weather. This lighter style with no lining is made from a stretchy material that has a UV 50+ protection factor. The visor protect the face and the back brim keeps the neck out of the sun.

Kids' sunhat with strings to keep it safely in place. Longer brim in the back and made from a UV-protective fabric. Lightweight design. Cover little ones' heads with this cool kids' sun hat featuring a UV protection factor of 50+. The visor keeps the harmful rays off children's eyes and necks. It's made from a breathable and light SunProof material and is a lighter style without a lining. Just tie the strings to keep it in place!

Reimatec baby winter booties. Very warm PrimaLoft® insulation. Durable and waterproof uppers. Brushed knit lining and anti-slip material on the soles. Our popular wadded babies' winter booties will help keep little toes warm and dry. These shoes are made from a breathable, waterproof material but the seams aren't sealed so they'll need to be kept out of puddles! Thanks to the soft brushed knit lining, these booties feel super comfortable. The rubbery anti-slip sole helps little ones take their first small steps outside and the material is dirt-repellent as well. We've now added drawstrings to the ankles, so these baby booties stay in place even more. Match them with Tassu mittens and a cute beanie!

Comfortable and soft toddlers' terry bodysuit. Perfect after a swim. Has high UV protection. A fun and cuddly cover-up after swimming, this terry toddlers' romper suit features a handy hood and sun protection factor of 50+ for complete coverage from the rays. The full-length zipper makes dressing easier and there are handy snap buttons at the leg seams to help with nappy changing.

Functional and warm mid-layer jumpsuit for toddlers in knitted fleece. Looks like a sweater set but has all the benefits as fleece. Very warm and quick-drying. This lightweight and soft fleece toddler base layer jumpsuit can be worn underneath outerwear to keep your child warm during frosty winter days. And it's also great for indoors! The upper section of this two-piece set has a full-length zipper for easy dressing and a chin guard protects necks from being scratched by the zip. Its fitted longer back hem provides extra coverage. The soft material of this toddler base-layer set looks knitted yet has all the benefits of fleece: it's comfortable against skin and dries quickly by transporting moisture to the outer layers. This all-in-one is available in the season's freshest colours.

Cool sunproof toddlers' all-in-one swimsuit in an elbow- and knee-length fit for active kids in summertime. The long zipper makes for easier dressing. This toddlers' SunProof swimsuit makes splashing fun both in the pool and on the beach. It provides effective protection against harmful sun rays with its UV 50+ coating all the way to the elbows and knees. The stretchy material also dries quickly, and the zipper has been placed in the front for easy dressing.

Babies' booties with lightweight wadding and a fleece lining. These lovely babies' booties are ideal for chilly winter days out in the pram. They have wadding and a soft fleece lining on the inside. Match them with adorable Talvik mittens to complete the look!

Babies' winter suit in a soft and warm fabric. Great quality and made from recycled materials. Easily converts into a sleeping bag. This warm winter babies' all-in-one suit easily converts into a sleeping bag with a zipper! The material is water-repellent, windproof and breathable, and half of it is made from recycled polyester. Designed with care and babies' comfort in mind, this piece has a lowered zip line so the soft and warm structure protects it from scratching your little one's skin.

Toddlers' long sleeve swim shirt with long sleeves and a longer hem at the back for extra coverage. High UV protection. Cover up gentle young skin under the sun with this toddlers' long sleeve rash guard. It's part of the Reima SunProof collection and has a UV sun protection factor of 50+. A longer back hem means better coverage during water-based fun and the zipper at the front helps with dressing.

Soft and warm wool-mix knit beanie for toddlers with windproof ear coverage. Soft and warm fleece lining. This toddlers' beanie with a fleece lining and windproof ear coverage is a perfect choice for winter. Strings keep it in place. It's also finished with adorable double pom-poms!

Highly protective toddlers' sunhat with advanced UV coverage. Has a long, wide brim and stylish visor. A toddlers' hat is a key accessory for sunny weather. This lighter style with no lining is made from a stretchy material that has a UV 50+ protection factor. The visor protect the face and the back brim keeps the neck out of the sun.

Functional and warm mid-layer all-in-one for toddlers made from velour. As warm as fleece but with excellent breathability. Can be attached to outerwear using the Play Layers snap buttons. This toddlers' all-in-one is made from a fantastic new anti-pilling and wrinkle-resistant material! It's also moisture-wicking, stretchy and truly comfortable to wear. Note that with the handy Play Layers system this kids' playsuit can be attached to many Reima outerwear items.

Reimatec toddlers' jumpsuit. Made from our new Reimatec Light fabric. Now extremely waterproof, durable and breathable, as well as soft and comfortable. Perfect for preschool. This kids' all-in-one is made from water-repellent material and all the seams are sealed for a waterproof finish. The functional material is also windproof and dirt-repellent but breathable at the same time. The smooth polyester lining makes dressing easier and won't hamper movements when little ones are having fun outdoors. The hood is detachable for safety and the elastic foot loops, which can also be removed, keep the leg hems in place. Many thoughtful details, like waist adjustment inside, a zip pocket for picking up mini treasures and reflecting details. This super comfortable kids' puddle suit is ideal for all tiMesh and all weathers!

A leakproof lining and snug fit means little ones can splash about carefree in these toddler and babies' swimming trunks. An eco-friendly choice. For a carefree baby or toddler swimming session, we strongly recommend these 'diaper' trunks! Made from SunProof material, these UV 50+ summer shorts provide effective protection against harmful rays. They're suitable for both the pool and beach. A snug fit around the legs and waist combined with a leak-proof lining prevent unwanted surprises. The elasticated waist can also be adjusted for comfort and an individual fit. This is also an ecological choice, as part of the fiber content comes from used PET beverage bottles.

Quick-drying and breathable toddlers' swimming trunks with an adjustable waist and high UV protection. An eco-friendly choice. These classic swimming shorts for kids are ideal for keeping children playing on the beach and in the water for longer. The material has a UV sun protection factor of 50+, giving effective coverage for delicate skin all the way to the knees. The adjustable, elasticated waist ensures a good fit and combines with the stretchy lining on the front of these kids' swim shorts for comfort. This is also an ecological choice, as part of the fiber content comes from used PET beverage bottles.

Reimatec toddlers' jumpsuit in a cute print. Perfect for days out in town. Two side pockets. This kids' all-in-one is made from water-repellent material and all the seams are sealed for a waterproof finish. The functional material is also windproof and dirt-repellent but breathable at the same time. The smooth polyester lining makes dressing easier and won't hamper movements when little ones are having fun outdoors. Many thoughtful details, like waist adjustment inside, list pockets for picking up mini treasures and reflecting details. This super comfortable kids' puddle suit is ideal for all tiMesh and all weathers!

This kids' all-in-one is made from water-repellent material and all the seams are sealed for a waterproof finish. The functional material is also windproof and dirt-repellent but breathable at the same time. The smooth polyester lining makes dressing easier and won't hamper movements when little ones are having fun outdoors. seo.title: Waterproof Rain Pants with Welded Seams, Suspenders & Foot Loops - Lammikko | Reima US
seo.description: Classic kids' waterproof trousers with suspenders. From 9 months to 8 years old, these waterproof trousers for toddlers and children are made from flexible materials and come in fantastic colours. These kids and toddlers' trousers with suspenders are made from a flexible, PVC-free material that won't harden in frost. Their seams are welded to make sure they're fully waterproof. The comfortable elasticated, adjustable suspenders keep the trousers up during playtime, while the foot loops help ensure the hems stay place. As well as being designed in a roomy shape without a lining, these waterproof trousers for ages 9 months to 8 years old come in a variety of fun colours and have reflective details so kids are easier to spot. To check out the new lock system on these year-round designs, see the video at the bottom of the page..

These children's waterproof mittens are made from a comfortable elasticated material and come with a robust polyester knit lining. These children's waterproof mittens are lined with knitted polyester for additional warmth and comfort. The welded seams help to make sure that they keep wetness away from skin. The flexible material doesn't harden in frost – with warm gloves underneath, these rain mittens for children can also be worn on colder days. They're made from a safe, PVC-free material with reflective details to keep kids seen when it's darker outside.

Enjoy the warmth of wool and the softness of a cotton lining with this kids' wool balaclava. This wool balaclava for toddlers and kids protects little heads during the colder seasons. It's made from a warm knit and is lined with a cotton-elastane blend that provides a snug fit and feels soft against skin. Windproof ear coverage between the shell and the lining protects little ones from chilly gusts. The traditional style of this kids' balaclava gives great protection for the forehead, cheeks and neck. Choose your favourite from the classic colourways!

Fully waterproof Reimatec toddlers' snowsuit in fun prints with a detachable faux-fur trim on the hood. Long zipper for easy dressing and an insulated seat. Features the Play Layers snap-button system. This toddlers' easy-care all-in-one snowsuit is ideal for winter fun. The waterproof design is made from a breathable and windproof material that also repels dirt. All the seams have been sealed waterproof and the snowsuit has an insulated seat that keeps bottoms warm and dry during cold-weather adventures. The smooth polyester lining makes dressing easier. Many Reima pieces can be attached to the overall thanks to the handy Play Layers snap-button system. The detachable and adjustable hood is safe when little ones are playing outdoors – connected with snap buttons, it comes off easily if it gets caught on something. Durable silicone foot loops keep the trouser hems in place, protecting little ankles from moisture and the cold. This tumble-dryer-friendly winter all-in-one is a great choice for crawling in the countryside or strolling in the city.

Attached with snap buttons, it comes off easily if it gets caught on something. Durable silicone foot loops keep the trouser hems in place, protecting little ankles from moisture and the cold. This tumble-dryer-friendly winter classic is a top choice for crawling in the snow or walking in the city alike!

Toddlers' beanie made from a wool-mix knit with a fleece lining. Windproof ear coverage for comfort. This season-favourite knitted beanie for toddlers is made from a warm wool-mix knit. It's ideal for regulating little ones' temperatures thanks to the natural material. The full fleece lining is warm and feels comfortable and the windproof coverage at the sides protects little ears. The tactile texture feels great.

Classic cotton-lined rubber kids' wellies. Available in bright colours. The shaft height is designed to fit your child based on their age. Our classic kids' wellies in yellow are also available in navy, summer green and pink. These pairs are made from a material that includes 40% natural rubber and the outsole is crafted from a vulcanized PVC-free rubber. Our children's rain boots are lined with cotton for comfort and include removable insoles with the Happy Fit print to help you find your little one's correct size.

Our most popular Reimatec high-top trainers! These classic toddler and kids' waterproof shoes have an easy-to-use Velcro fastening. They're machine washable at cold temperatures. Puddles are no problem thanks to these Patter Wash toddlers' high-top trainers. This waterproof pair of Reimatec footwear is a smaller version of our Wetter style. They're machine washable at cold temperatures and can be worn to playschool, on a camping trip or at the park... you name it! Light yet functional, they're ideal for almost any weather. Equipped with a seam-sealed insert and textile lining, the upper is made from durable nylon while the tips of the toes are counter-reinforced with soft microfibre. Thanks to the adjustable Velcro straps, little ones can put this pair on by themselves (or with a little help from parents). These children's waterproof shoes have removable insoles with Reima's own Happy Fit print to help you find the correct size. The reflective details and new cheery colours are fun to match with other Reima kids' outerwear and accessories.
Wool-mix toddlers' beanie with windproof ear coverage. This wool-mix toddlers' beanie comes with a half lining and windproof ear coverage. The strings on this autumn-appropriate hat keep it in place.

Unlined kids' waterproof mittens made from a flexible and PVC-free material. They come in a choice of colours. These unlined waterproof kids' mittens are made from a flexible, PVC-free material and come in a choice of colours. The welded seams help ensure that they keep little ones dry no matter how many puddles need to be splashed in. The elasticated band with a snap button on the wrist creates a snug fit.

This woollen kids' base layer balaclava regulates warmth brilliantly. The comfy design protects little foreheads, cheeks and necks. This kids' base layer balaclava regulates warmth well. It's perfect for protecting little foreheads, cheeks and necks. The wool-mix knit is soft and warm. As this is a lighter style without a lining, it's great for wearing under a beanie or helmet for extra protection and warmth. You can also roll it down to protect children's faces – a fab function on a chilly and windy day!

Reimatec winter mittens for toddlers. Very warm PrimaLoft® insulation. Durable and water-resistant. The long zipper means they're easy to put on. Our new-and-improved toddlers' winter mittens with PrimaLoft® wadding are now even warmer. The soft and flexible material is also windproof yet manages to stay breathable for comfort. While these gloves are resistant to water, they're not fully waterproof so are best suited to dry and frosty winter days. For added warmth in the coldest temperatures we recommend wearing woollen mittens underneath. Thanks to the zipper, these gloves are easy to slip on little hands and the soft polyester knit lining feels comfortable against skin. Our dirt-resistant pair can also be tumble-dried, so they'll always be ready for fun adventures.

Toddlers' rain outfit to brighten up grey days. Includes a waterproof jacket and trousers. Available in blue or pink. Room to Grow: All Reima products run about one size larger than traditional US sizes so ordering your child’s current size is like ordering a size up. Click to learn more.  This unlined kids' rain outfit is great for wet days in spring and autumn – when you add warm layers underneath, it'll protect little ones even during the chilliest weather. Welded, waterproof seams guarantee that no rain seeps through to skin underneath this kids' waterproof suit. A detachable hood not only protects from drizzle but is also safe when they're playing outdoors in wet weather. The trousers stay up thanks to the elasticated, adjustable suspenders. The removable foot loops are easy to pop under rubber boots or waterproof trainers to keep hems in place. This children's rain gear is made from a stretchy material that's PVC-free. Reimatec warm and waterproof jumpsuit for toddlers. Insulated with down and made from Reimatec+ stretch fabric. Finished with a long zipper and insulated seat. Our Reimatec+ winter jumpsuit for toddlers has lots of fab features! All its seams are sealed waterproof and it has a water- and dirt-repellent surface. The smooth lining makes slipping it on wriggly little ones easier and the detachable hood is safe because it comes off easily if caught on something. The insulation is made up of 60% down and 40% feathers and the seat is filled with wadding for extra warmth. A small zipper pocket keeps tiny treasures safe.

Reimatec water- and windproof toddlers' winter jacket in a stretchy material. Cute detachable faux-fur trim on the hood. Our Reimatec winter jacket for toddlers is ready for the great outdoors. The wadded design for young kids has seamed seals for a waterproof finish and its material is water-and dirt-repellent. We've added extra warm insulation that's also super flexible so it doesn't minimise movement. The hood is detachable for safety – it comes off easily if caught on something – and is designed to give extra protection against wind. The faux-fur trim is also removable. Small treasures stay safe in the two zip pockets.

Toddlers' beanie made from soft Merino wool for great temperature control. Windproof sides to protect small ears. Our toddlers' Merino wool beanie comes in cute seasonal colours and is a trusty winter warmer. It's ideal for frosty weather because of its warm fleece lining that dries quickly and transports moisture away from the skin. The stretchy knit makes for a snug fit and the windproof ear coverage protects little ones from chilly gusts. Thanks to the strings, this stylish beanie stays where it should. Match with a neck warmer for a cosy look!

Reimatec toddlers' classic parka jacket. Very warm. Made from a stretchy material. Fully waterproof, breathable and windproof. Our Reimatec winter parka for toddlers is ready for the great outdoors. This design for young kids has seamed seals for a waterproof finish and its material is water-and dirt-repellent. We've added extra warm insulation that's also super flexible so it doesn't hamper your little one's movement. The hood is detachable for safety – it comes off easily if caught on something – and is designed to give extra protection against wind. The faux-fur trim is also removable and small treasures stay safe in the two zip pockets.

Softshell jumpsuit for toddlers that blocks the wind and keeps lightweight rain off skin. Made from a waterproof material. Breathable, very soft and comfortable to wear. This toddlers' windproof softshell jumpsuit is breathable and water-repellent. Sizes start from 74cm, so even the smallest family member can take a nap outside in this cosy item. The detachable hood protects from chilly winds but is also safe when playing and the full-length zipper with a chin guard helps out when you're getting little ones dressed..

Reimatec fully waterproof toddlers' snowsuit in fun prints. Long zipper for easy dressing and an insulated seat. Features the versatile Play Layers system. This toddlers' easy-care snowsuit is ideal for all kinds of winter fun. It's made from a breathable and windproof material that also repels dirt. All its seams are sealed for a waterproof finish and the insulated seat keeps bottoms warm and dry during cold-weather adventures. The smooth polyester lining makes dressing easy. Many Reima items can be attached to the overall thanks to the handy Play Layers snap-button system. The removable and adjustable hood is safe when kids are playing outdoors. Attached with snap buttons, it comes off easily if caught on something. Durable silicone foot loops keep the trouser hems in place, protecting little ankles from moisture and the cold. This tumble-dryer-friendly winter classic is a top choice for crawling in the snow or walking in the city alike!

Reimatec toddlers' snowsuit. Very waterproof and finished with handy reflective details. Designed for especially active young children. Fitted cut. This is a new snowsuit for toddlers' with fantastic features. The material is very durable as well as water- and dirt-repellent, and the seams on the legs are sealed to create a waterproof finish. Extra insulation is added to the seat, so there are no worries about the cold when kids are playing in the snow. This style is ergonomically designed for active toddlers and is also a little slimmer than usual for a snug feel. The stylish stripes are reflective, making little ones easier to spot on dark days!

Warm wool beanie for active toddlers in winter. This toddlers' beanie comes in on-trend seasonal colours and is a trusty winter warmer during cold days! Made from Merino wool, the soft fleece lining adds warmth and feels comfortable as it dries quickly and transports moisture away from the skin. The stretchy knit guarantees a snug fit and the windproof coverage at the sides protect tiny ears from chilly breezes. Thanks to the strings, this stylish beanie for kids will stay where it should. Match it with a neck warmer for a cosy look.

Reimatec toddlers' stretch snowsuit. Designed for active kids. Has a narrow fit, reinforced knees and is fully waterproof. Our toddlers' snowsuit is made for outdoor-loving little ones. All its seams are sealed for a waterproof finish and the material is also water- and dirt-repellent. The fabric is stretchy, too, and the knees are reinforced with a durable material. As the seat is insulated, playing on cold surfaces is as comfortable as can be. The detachable hood is also safe because it comes off easily if caught on something and gives extra protection against wind. Toddlers will be ready to explore in no time while wearing this excellent all-in-one.

Reimatec warm and waterproof all-in-one for babies and toddlers. Made with down insulation and Reimatec+ stretch fabric. Can easily be converted into a sleeping bag. Now also for babies, our Reimatec+ winter all-in-one has the same excellent features in a smaller size. All its seams are sealed waterproof. The water- and dirt-repellent surface means it's easy to take care of and the smooth lining makes dressing simpler. On top of this, it can also be easily converted into a sleeping bag. The insulation is made up of 60% down and 40% feathers. For extra warmth, the seat of the suit is insulated with wadding. Note that the outside has a matte surface, so it doesn't feel slippery when you're holding your baby.

Functional all-in-one for toddlers made from a warm knit fleece. Striking all-over print and long ribbed cuffs. Very cosy and quick-drying. This toddlers' all-in-one is made from a soft mélange fleece and comes in a fun sporty print. The design is perfect for early autumn or as a mid-layer in winter.

Reimatec toddlers' winter trousers with a long zipper and suspenders. The high waist gives extra protection and the insulated seat lends warmth. Waterproof and windproof. These popular toddlers' trousers are made for winter fun! Crafted from a windproof and breathable material, they won't cause kids to sweat during action-packed adventures. The fabric also repels water and dirt. A high waist and adjustable suspenders guarantee a tailored fit and the long zipper makes dressing easier. The extra wadding on the seat ensures little bottoms stay warm and the elastic foot loops keep the trouser hems in place.

title: Toddler Outdoor Clothing
descriptionHtml:
What Makes Our Toddler Clothes Unique

We know that a love for the great outdoors starts at a young age. That’s why Reima’s toddler outdoor gear, swimwear is made with future adventurers in mind. Attention to detail sets us apart:

  • Snowsuits have extra room in the seat to accommodate diapers
  • Chin guards keep little faces protected from zippers
  • Foot loops help keep toddlers warm and dry by preventing the pant legs from riding up.
  • Elasticated waists and cuffs that let kids move comfortably.
  • Sealed seams on our outerwear keep toddlers warm and dry and all our clothes have a little room to grow!


All of our toddler clothes come in an array of colors and sizes, making it easy to craft the perfect look for any winter activity. Shop our full collection to find everything from toddler boots to snow pants today!

[first_paragraph]

Toddlers can be a force of nature. Luckily forces of nature are our specialty! Reima’s range of toddler outdoor clothes, swimwear, rain gear, & sun protection clothing are comfortable yet hard-wearing and made with little ones in mind.

title: Kids Outdoor Clothing & Gear
descriptionHtml:
Explore. Discover. Do.

All our clothes are made to help active kids enjoy the outdoors.

  • Kids stay warm and dry in our Reimatec ski jackets and pants for all-day comfort on the slopes
  • Innovative materials stay looking newer for longer and are good for the environment! Reima’s Play Jersey tops are made with 40% polyester made from recycled plastic bottles
  • Summer Fun in the sun is even better with our SunProof line—it has a UPF rating of up to 50+

All-Weather is Outdoor Weather

The joy of movement starts early. At Reima, we believe the right clothes will help active kids conquer the world around them. That’s why we put comfort and safety at the heart of our designs. Our clothes fit perfectly and are never restrictive so kids can move and play freely as long as they want. 

For summer activities like walks along the beach, look for boys’ and girls’ shorts with a UPF 50+ rating. Fun convertible pants turn into easily into shorts—perfect for summer evenings. 

And when those long summer days give way to chilly fall weather? Our warm Merino wool thermals are comfortable under a warm fleece jacket and softshell pants. Just the thing for climbing trees and collecting leaves. 

[first_paragraph] Shop jackets & overalls, base & mid-layers, boots & shoes, pants, beanies, and gloves & mittens.

Whether it’s a warm, sunny day, rainy and windy or white with snow, we have just the outfit for adventurous kids to go out and conquer the world. Discover our collection of children’s cool summer clothes and cozy winter clothes for kids.

title: All Swimwear

title: All Kids Rain Gear
descriptionHtml:
Girls’ and Boys’ Rain Jackets

Downpours are no match for our lightweight yet sturdy rain jackets for boys and girls. They’re made from PVC-free material that won’t harden in the cold, so they’re perfect all year round—just add layers in the winter. Elasticated cuffs give extra protection against the rain while adjustable waists make for a comfortable fit. The hoods are removable and can be snapped on and off as needed.

Gray skies won’t get you down with our collection of kids’ rain jackets in cheerful colors. They also have reflective accents to make kids easier to spot in the dark. Our waterproof jackets come in toddler sizes too. Pair your toddler’s rain jacket with rain boots and our practical waterproof mittens that go over the sleeve to keep younger children happy and dry all day.

Rain Pants for Boys and Girls

Rainy day activities like making mud pies and jumping in puddles are much more fun with the right gear. Our rain pants for kids are lightweight yet sturdy and free from PVC. Practical bib styles offer even more protection against the weather and have suspenders with an easy twist lock. Our midseason waterproof pants have adjustable hems so there’s plenty of room to grow.

[first_paragraph]

Reima knows there’s no such thing as bad weather so our collection of rain jackets and pants will keep kids dry even on the wettest days. Our kids’ rain jackets stand out from the rest with features like detachable hoods, welded seams, and reflective details. Find rain pants with adjustable hems and suspenders.

seo.description: Find kids’ rain jackets for when days turn drizzly. Shop the collection of waterproof jackets and pants for children at Reima.

These children's waterproof mittens are made from a comfortable elasticated material and come with a robust polyester knit lining. These children's waterproof mittens are lined with knitted polyester for additional warmth and comfort. The welded seams help to make sure that they keep wetness away from skin. The flexible material doesn't harden in frost – with warm gloves underneath, these rain mittens for children can also be worn on colder days. They're made from a safe, PVC-free material with reflective details to keep kids seen when it's darker outside.

title: Kids Winter & Snow Boots

Say goodbye to tight shoes and cold toes. Our sturdy winter boots are tough on the outside but insulated and warm on the inside. Warm linings keep toes toasty—some are even removable for easy washing.

Look for kids’ winter boots with special grooves for foot loops so you can secure your child’s winter pants and prevent them from riding up. And boots with Vibram Arctic Grip rubber soles prevent slipping on icy surfaces. Plus, the Happy Fit removable insoles ensure your children’s winter boots have a comfortable fit. Just take them out and have your child stand on the guide—if their foot goes over the line, it’s time to go to up a size.

The Reimatec Promise

You can count on our Reimatec line for reliable waterproof winter shoes for kids. The seams are sealed tight so you know children will stay cozy and warm even on treks through wet and snowy terrain. Choose from a variety of fastening options too. Sturdy laces allow older children to tighten and loosen their boots as necessary, while zipper and Velcro styles are perfect for younger kids.

title: Kids & Youth Rain Boots
descriptionHtml:

Forget stiff, uncomfortable rain boots—ours are made for action. With soft cotton lining, and 40% natural rubber, these flexible girls’ and boys’ rain boots can be worn all day long. Just pair them with cozy wool socks when the temperature dips and light ones on not-so-cold days.

They also come with our Happy Fit removable insoles so you know your kids’ rain boots fit like a glove. Just place your child’s foot on the insole and check to see if their foot goes over the line. If it does, it’s time to size up.

For long walks and puddle splashing, the right pair of rain boots can turn rainy days into happy days. Our rain boots for toddlers are made especially for little legs. The boot shaft is shorter, so it won’t impair walking and running.

Cold Weather Rain Boots for Kids

title: Sneakers for Kids
descriptionHtml:

Give kids the right sneaker and some space to run, and they’ll feel unstoppable. Our kids’ sneakers offer daylong support and extra comfort with details like padding at the ankles and flexible soles. Many are machine washable too.

Our easy pull-on styles are perfect for running out the door in a flash. Our toddler sneakers with practical Velcro tabs are a cinch for younger kids to open and close. Classic laces look cool and offer a snug fit.

At Reima, we don’t skimp on the details. That’s why our sneakers and tennis shoes for kids have soft linings that make them comfortable to wear even without socks. You’ll also find kids’ sneakers with non-scuffing soles so they can be worn indoors too.

Midseason Sneakers for Kids

We know kids don’t slow down when the weather turns chilly—that’s where our cozy waterproof and water-resistant sneaker comes in. Sturdy soles cover the toe so stepping in puddles won’t result in soggy socks. Velcro straps make it easy for kids of all ages to put on and take off. Plus, handy guides take the guesswork out of securing foot loops.

Not sure whether your kids’ sneakers are getting tight? Check out styles with Happy Fit removable insoles. They come printed with a guide your child can stand on. If their foot goes over the line, it’s time to move up a size.

Our Reimatec high-tops offer extra padding at the ankle that’s perfect for hiking and climbing. They’re completely waterproof too, with nylon uppers and a sealed lining. They come in a variety of colors and many are machine washable too. What’s not to love?

title: Kids Outdoor Shoes
descriptionHtml:
Versatile Kids’ Sneakers

Sneakers are children’s go-to shoe and ours are sure to become a favorite staple. Easy pull-on designs and those with Velcro fastenings make it easy for kids to dress themselves. Strong yet flexible soles ensure all day comfort and many of our sneakers are machine washable too so they’ll look and smell fresh.

Not only but do these classic styles look cool, they’ll also protect against rain and puddles. The secret is in the waterproof insert with sealed seams and mesh lining.

Boys’ and Girls’ Winter Boots

Make soggy socks and chilly toes a thing of the past with our kids’ winter boots. Our hardwearing snow boots for kids are sturdy on the outside but insulated and warm on the inside. Find styles with removable linings that are easy to wash.

Our kids’ winter boots also come with special grooves for foot loops. These secure pants to the shoe to prevent snow from getting in. And boots with Vibram Arctic Grip rubber soles help kids stay steady on icy surfaces.

Drizzle Defying Rain Boots

Kids’ rain boots that are flexible and comfortable? Yes, please. Our collection of bright and cheery children’s rain boots is made to move. They’re constructed from 40% natural rubber and are free from PVC. They come with our Happy Fit insoles too, which aside from making them comfortable lets parents know when it’s time to size up. We know toddlers need fresh air every day, even if it’s raining. That’s why our toddler rain boots have shorter shafts that are especially adapted to younger children’s legs. This means toddlers are free to run and splash to their heart’s content.

Kids’ Shoes at Reima: A Step Ahead

At Reima we understand that unstoppable kids need unstoppable shoes. That’s why our shoes for kids are made to last. Flexible soles are made for running and jumping and reflective details keep kids visible and safe on dark evenings.

Look for our tried and true Reimatec line of waterproof shoes. Find uppers in sturdy nylon and stylish suede. Waterproof inserts keep kids dry and comfortable all day. And some are even machine washable!

Looking to outfit kids of different ages? Our winter mittens and gloves come in sizes from toddlers to juniors. They’re also made to fit snugly over jacket sleeves for added protection. Reflective accents help keep kids visible and safe on dark winter evenings.

title: Base Layers for Kids
descriptionHtml:
Fleece Mid Layers

A quintessential wardrobe staple all year long, our fleece is made for action. Our fleece jackets have a little stretch, so they’ll keep kids comfortable as they play. They can be paired with a warm winter coat or worn on their own on warmer days. And they also resist pilling so they’ll look like new for longer.

There’s no reason for babies and toddlers to miss out on the fun. That’s why our fleece baby rompers and toddler one-piece suits are cozy yet breathable. Our popular knit fleece designs look and feel like a sweater but have the moisture-wicking properties of fleece. Diaper changes are easy thanks to the full-length zippers and ribbed cuffs at the wrists and ankles keep out the cold.

Merino Wool Base Layers

From walks in the woods to days on the slopes, our wool thermals for kids are made to keep up with active kids. The details are everything—flat seams prevent chafing and tops with longer back hems keep the cold and wind out. For extra protection from the elements, try our merino wool base layers with Tencel®.

Scratchy wool is a thing of the past. Our wool toddler and baby rompers have brushed lining so younger children can enjoy a comfortable outing.

Kids’ Thermals

Our kids’ thermals come in a variety of weights and fabrics extra versatility. Smart materials like THERMOLITE® keep their insulation properties even when wet, making them perfect for a rainy day. Dual-layer thermals are even cozier in cold weather while light wool blends can double as loungewear after a busy day outside.

[first_paragraph]

Just like a snowman, your child’s outdoor wardrobe needs a solid foundation. Our base and mid-layers are perfect companions all year long. Look for merino wool base layers and high-performance thermals in our collection.

title: Kids Winter Jackets & Coats
descriptionHtml:
What Sets Our Kids’ Jackets Apart?

  • Elasticated cuffs fit snugly under gloves and mittens, adjustable waists allow for a comfortable fit and taped seams keep moisture out
  • Safety matters to us! Detachable hoods snap on and off easily meaning they’ll stay out of the way when not in use
  • Our jackets and coats have at least 2 inches of room to grow so you know your child’s jacket will last them through the season

Kids’ Coats and Jackets for all Weather

Whether you’re planning a family ski trip or just want to make sure the kids get plenty of time outside on cold days, Reima has you covered. Find hardwearing kids’ winter coats made with Reimatec water-repellent fabric, which keeps budding adventurers dry and comfortable all day. Or try a padded down jacket for extra coziness.

The weather can change without warning so it’s a good idea to pack a light jacket even on a seemingly sunny day. Our collection of lightweight and mid-season jackets offers the ideal companion on family day trips or your summer vacation. Don’t forget to add warm layers and you’ll be ready for whatever the weather holds!

Reima's Green Promise 

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

Adventurous kids don’t flinch at the first sign of cold and wind and neither do our jackets. Our selection of boys’ and girls’ winter coats and light summer jackets will accompany your children on daily outdoor adventures come rain or shine. Shop the all-weather collection at Reima.

title: One Piece Snowsuits for Kids
descriptionHtml:
One-piece Snowsuits for Toddlers

Reima knows that a love for the great outdoors starts at a young age. That’s why our collection of baby and toddler snowsuits is designed with future explorers in mind. They feature helpful details like chin guards to protect little faces and extra-roomy bottoms to accommodate diapers.

And for babies who can’t quite toddle around but love to sit in the snow, we have styles with extra padding on the seat. Plus, fabrics with thermal control features help keep younger kids’ core temperature at just the right level.

One-piece Snowsuits for Big Kids

Snow days are made for exploring so our one-piece snowsuits will ensure kids forget about the chill. Made to withstand Nordic winters, our snowsuits for older kids are waterproof and windproof yet breathable thanks to our exclusive Reimatec fabric. Taped seams keep moisture out and wind flaps with snap closures provide another layer of protection against the cold.

All our snowsuits come with detachable hoods to keep kids safe and comfortable when they’re out exploring. Look for designs with extra cozy faux-fur trims on hoods.

It’s all in the details

We think dressing up for the cold should be easy and comfortable, which is why our snowsuits for toddlers and big kids have tons of features that make them extra cozy. Elasticated cuffs fit snuggly over gloves and mittens, and most suits come with detachable foot loops to keep them from slipping under shoes.

Caring for your children’s snowsuit is easy too—they’re machine washable and can go in the dryer. They’re also free from harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons to give you added peace of mind.

[first_paragraph]

Looking for waterproof big kid and toddler snowsuits that are also breathable and comfortable? Our one-piece styles will keep kids warm and dry even in the coldest temperatures. Discover our collection of hardwearing yet easy-care one-piece snowsuits.

title: Kids’ Outerwear
descriptionHtml:
Coveralls

Dressing young children for a day out can be challenging enough which is why our coveralls are designed with ease in mind. Our waterproof rain suits and snowsuits for toddlers and big kids have unfussy fastenings and practical pockets with zippers. All hoods are detachable for extra safety.

Snowsuits for toddlers and babies also have extra room in the seat to allow for diapers. And all rain suits and snowsuits have taped seams and are made from material free from harmful fluorocarbons.

Girls’ and Boys’ Jackets

Whether kids are hitting the slopes or simply out exploring on a snowy day, Reima has them covered. Our winter jackets for girls and boys made with Reimatec waterproof fabric will keep young explorers comfortable and dry all day.

Looking for some extra coziness? Try a padded jacket made from responsibly sourced down to keep kids toasty when the temperature drops.

And once winter has passed but the chill in the air hasn’t, look for lighter fleece-lined softshell jackets that provide warmth without the bulk. They repel dirt and are easy to care for too, thanks to their Teflon EcoElite® coating.

Kids’ Pants

Kids’ pants that stand up to the elements, but are breathable and comfortable? It’s not too good to be true! Our children’s waterproof pants are that and more. Designed with active kids in mind, our collection will keep children happy no matter what the weather holds.

Find easy-to-wear styles with adjustable waists and zipped pockets. Designs with mesh lining are extra comfy and as always, our high-performance pants are free from harmful chemicals and fluorocarbons.

Rain Gear

Reima knows there’s no such thing as bad weather so our collection of rain gear will keep kids dry even on the drizzliest days. Our waterproof pants for kids go the extra mile with features like taped seams and comfortable mesh lining to make kids forget about the weather.

Find lightweight rain jackets for boys and girls made from PVC-free material. Elasticated cuffs add an extra layer of protection against the rain while adjustable waists make for a custom fit.

[first_paragraph]

Give a kid the right gear and they can take over the world. That's what we think, anyway. Our collection of kid’s outerwear will keep children comfortable on their daily adventures. Shop waterproof pants, jackets, and rain gear for all seasons. They’ll only be limited by their imagination.

title: All Hats for Kids
descriptionHtml:
Kids’ Winter Hats and Balaclavas

Let our wool and wool blend hats and balaclavas accompany kids on their winter adventures. You’ll find 100% wool ski masks with a cotton blend lining that are made to withstand Nordic winters and have windproof earpieces to protect against howling gusts. These winter favorites are perfectly cozy on their own can be worn under a helmet when skiing.

Kids’ and Baby Beanies

As stylish as they are comfortable, our kids’ and baby beanies come in seasonal prints. Many made from 100% merino wool, these hats also have a fleece lining that wicks moisture away from the skin. Some styles feature festive pom poms that are sure to bring a smile to children’s faces. A practical tie keeps these baby and toddler hats in place so they won’t fall off during a fun run in the woods. Look for complementing wool socks for head to toe coziness.

Kids’ Rain Hats

A rainy day is no match for our stylish rain hats. They’re made from flexible and comfortable PVC-free material and have welded seams so the rain stays out. They also come in a rainbow of colors to brighten the gloomiest days—perfect for matching with bright rain jackets and boots.

Sun Hats for Kids

Sunny days call for swimming and hiking, biking and running. Our sun hats for kids have a UPF rating of 50+. Reversible bucket styles have a different cheerful color on each side. For younger children, our lightweight hats feature a longer brim at the back to protect sensitive necks. You’ll also find baseball cap styles suitable for all ages. They’re made from breathable twill and have adjustable backs.

[first_paragraph]

From summer sun to winter fun, a trusty hat will keep intrepid kids cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Find cozy wool winter hats, balaclavas, and baby beanies or stock up for a sunny day with our UPF 50+ sun hats.

title: Kids Accessories
descriptionHtml:
Kids’ Gloves and Mittens

With waterproof shells and cozy linings, our mittens and gloves were made with adventurous kids in mind. The PVC-free material is strong yet flexible and won’t harden in frosty weather. Sturdy padded grips help kids hold on to slippery surfaces and the welded seams ensure no water gets in. Our Reimatec gloves can even be tumble dried!

When the snow is gone but there’s still a chill in the air, our midseason gloves come to the rescue. They’re made from soft wool blends and some are touchscreen-friendly too.

Kids Hats and Baby Beanies

From breezy sun hats to wooly baby beanies, our collection has kids covered. On sunny days look to our reversible hats in a rainbow of colors. Hats with long back brims keep younger children cool as they play. And with a UPF rating of 50+, you can rest assured your child is protected in the sun.

Winter escapades are more fun with our cozy beanies and hats. Our merino wool beanies come in seasonal designs and with festive pom-poms. Fleece linings feel comfortable against the skin and wick away moisture. Plus, built-in earpieces protect children from the frosty wind.

And what about rainy days? Don’t worry, our stylish and colorful rain hats have reinforced seams to keep kids dry. They come with straps so they stay put on younger children and the flexible material is free from PVC.

A lifelong love for the great outdoors starts with the right gear. Our kids’ gloves and hats for all weather and seasons will accompany curious kids all year long. title: Juniors' Jeans

Why Reima jeans are more than just regular jeans.

title: Toddlers Outerwear
descriptionHtml:
Toddler Snow Pants and Rain Pants

Skiing, sledding, building snowmen and more! It’s all more fun in snow pants for toddlers. They’re warm and completely waterproof—perfect for letting young ones join in on family adventures. Our ski pants have easy-to-remove suspenders and zipped pockets to keep those important little treasures safe. And adjustable waists ensure these pants will fit all winter long. 

And for those drizzly days? Reima’s selection of toddler rain pants will help keep kids active even on those cold, wet days. Our toddler rain pants are completely waterproof yet free from PVC and other harmful chemicals. And our midseason waterproof pants offer plenty of room to grow with their handy adjustable hems. 

Toddler Coats and Jackets

Reimatec is our patented water-repellent yet breathable fabric. Free from fluorocarbons and other harmful chemicals, it’s also long-lasting so it’s perfect for toddlers’ coats and jackets. What’s more, our coats and jackets for toddlers are easy to care for. Just put them in the washing machine. Many can also be tumble dried on low heat. And here’s a tip: Put three tennis balls in the drier with your jacket to help it keep its shape. 

Meticulous attention to detail sets Reima apart when it comes to our toddler coats and jackets. The seams are sealed to make our jackets truly waterproof—this makes them last longer, too. All hoods are removable for extra safety. The faux fur trims also come off easily. 

Down for some winter fun? Our down jackets for toddlers are as cozy as they come. They repel dirt and water so they’re both comfy and practical. Some styles, like our Ilma and Ilta down jackets and can even be tumble dried! What’s not to love? 

Toddlers Rain Jackets

No need to cancel plans over a little rain—our lightweight rain jackets for toddlers will have little ones happy to be out and about. There’s no PVC (harmful chemicals) here and the flexible material won’t freeze in cold weather. 

Toddlers are known for having those certain favorites that they just have to wear. Just add some warm mid-layers and their Reima rain jacket will keep them warm in dry in the winter. Elastic on the cuffs and adjustable waists make our toddler rain jackets even easier to wear. Hoods are detachable and the seams are welded. 

Reima's Green Promise 

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

Hitting the slopes, making snow angels or splashing in puddles—no matter how your toddler likes to play, our award-winning outerwear has them covered. Our waterproof jumpsuits for toddlers are made with Reaimatec fabric that’s both waterproof and breathable. Unfussy zippers make dressing restless little ones that little bit easier. 

Shop coats and jackets for toddlers that will keep them warm and dry on those chilly winter days. Cheerful prints and bright colors will have toddlers happy to get dressed!

title: All Toddler Jackets
descriptionHtml:
Winter and Ski Jackets for Toddlers

Toddlers can’t resist playing in the snow—and when they’re wrapped up warm, they don’t have to! Our winter jackets for boys and girls are made to be enjoyed outdoors and keep little ones happy outside thanks to warm padding that’s also flexible. The handy zippered pockets keep ski passes and other valuables safe. 

Reima’s toddler ski jackets are made with our own Reimatec fabric. It’s a long-lasting material so it’s great for toddlers’ coats and jackets. The best part? Reimatec is easy to care for. Put it in the washing machine and tumble dry it on low heat after a long day on the slopes. Three tennis balls in the dryer will help your jacket keep its shape. 

Down Jackets for Toddlers

On extra cold outings, there’s nothing like down to keep toddlers warm and cozy. Down is known for its insulation properties and our down jackets for toddlers are designed to keep young ones cozy all day long. Like all our toddler outerwear, they repel water and dirt. And just like our winter jackets for toddlers, our down coats and jackets can be washed and tumble dried. 

3-in-1 Toddler Jackets

Sometimes we just don’t know what the weather holds. Will it be cold but sunny? Or warm but windy? Our popular 3-in-1 jacket offers the perfect solution to this outerwear dilemma. Like all our Reimatec jackets, it’s waterproof and breathable. This functional jacket can be worn as a rain jacket—just take out the insulated lining! When there’s only a slight chill in the air, the lining can be worn on its own. And when it’s more than a little cold, just zip the lining back in and you have a cozy toddlers’ winter jacket. Its big pockets keep little ones’ precious finds safe and the reflective details offer extra protection on dark winter evenings. 

Toddlers Rain Jackets

Rainy days are no match for our boys’ and girls’ light rain jackets. The seams on our raincoats and jackets are welded shut to make them truly waterproof. Try fleece-lined rain jackets for extra warmth, or opt for an unlined jacket and add cozy layers underneath. 

Toddlers get the perfect fit with adjustable waists and elasticated cuffs, making our rain jackets versatile and easy to wear.

Toddlers’ Light Jackets

Our light jackets for toddlers are a great option for those chilly spring and fall days. They’re made from a soft, stretchy material that allows young adventurers to move around comfortably all day long. Reima’s breathable softshell jackets for toddlers have a soft fleece lining and all have detachable hoods. The hems and cuffs are elasticated for an even better fit.

Reima's Green Promise 

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

Banish the cold with our cheerful collection of jackets for toddlers. Young explorers will love the bright patterns and parents will appreciate our trusted range of waterproof, windproof and easy-care jackets. Unfussy buttons and snaps make it a little easier to dress toddlers who are just too eager to go out and play. 

Shop Reima’s collection of jackets for toddlers, including warm, insulated ski jackets with faux fur trims, soft down styles, lightweight softshell designs for those mild days outside, and our popular 3-in-1 jackets.

title: Toddlers Snow Pants & Bibs
descriptionHtml:
For making a snowman or learning the ropes on the slopes

From backyard snowmen to your toddler’s first ski trip, our toddler snow pants will ensure little ones are comfortable all day. 

  • Our toddler snow pants have a padded seat that’s great for younger children, who are more likely to spend time sitting as they play in the snow
  • Adjustable suspenders and Velcro hems help you achieve the perfect fit for your toddler
  • Snug toddler snow bibs offer even more protection from the cold by covering the tummy and back

Reimatec: made to move

At Reima we’ve been making clothes for active children for 75 years. Over time, we have refined our materials and practices to give your family the very best. 

Reima's Green Promise

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]There’s a reason our snow pants are so popular. It’s because they’re comfortable and easy to wear! The Reimatec fabric is waterproof and windproof but breathable—perfect for keeping sweat at bay even when toddlers are running around all day. The high waist on our snow bibs for toddlers keeps little ones warm by ensuring layers stay tucked in. Shop our collection of cozy, waterproof toddler snow pants below.

title: Toddlers Base Layers
descriptionHtml:
The Base-ics on Our Layers

  • Our base and mid-layers are made from super-soft wool or light, quick-drying synthetic materials, that transfer moisture away from the body 
  • The seams are flat and soft so they won’t chafe delicate skin
  • Our layers are easy to care for—machine wash them with cool water and dry them at room temperature 
  • Add waterproof jackets or snowsuits when the weather calls for it 

Cozy layers for year-round comfort 

Young children can’t regulate their body temperature as well as adults and older kids can. That’s why it’s a great idea to use layers to create your toddler’s outfit. Start with super-soft wool or synthetic base layer that will wick moisture away from the body, keeping your toddler’s core temperature at an ideal level. 

For extra protection from the cold and rain, try our merino wool base layers for toddlers with Tencel®. This unique blend will keep toddlers warm even when it’s wet.

Reima's Green Promise

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

Toddlers can be as unpredictable as the weather. The secret to keeping them warm and comfortable on those days out exploring? It’s all in the layers! They form the perfect foundation for your toddler’s outfit. Top your toddler’s base layer with a warm, knit-look mid-layer—it looks like a sweater but this quick-drying material has all the benefits and performance of fleece.

seo.title: Toddler Base Layers & Ski Base Layers | Reima US
seo.description: Reima's selection of base layers are made with the active toddler in mind. Comfortable and durable, they will keep you warm in any weather. Shop today!

Kids' thermal underwear set made from a soft and durable Merino wool-Tencel® mix for great temperature control. This base layer outfit is ideal for year-round use. A full-length zipper makes putting the piece on easy and the chin guard protects delicate necks from the zip. For added comfort, all the seams on this all-in-one have a thin, flat construction that doesn't chafe.

This suit is perfect for wearing outdoors in the early autumn or as a mid-layer in winter. The quilted-effect surface and striped ribbed collar and cuffs finish off the urban look.

Functional and warm mid-layer jumpsuit for toddlers in knitted fleece. Looks like a sweater set but has all the benefits as fleece. Very warm and quick-drying. The upper section of this two-piece set has a full-length zipper for easy dressing and a chin guard protects necks from being scratched by the zip. Its fitted longer back hem provides extra coverage. The soft material of this toddler base-layer set looks knitted yet has all the benefits of fleece: it's comfortable against skin and dries quickly by transporting moisture to the outer layers. This all-in-one is available in the season's freshest colours.

Kids' thermal underwear set made from super warm Thermolite®. With excellent temperature control, these base layers are ideal for year-round use. Thanks to this kids' base-layer set your little one can stay active in any weather. The Thermolite® material keeps children warm and dry because it transports moisture effectively from the skin to the outer layers. The set feels super comfortable against skin and the flat-lock seams are lightweight and don't chafe. The longer, curved back hem provides extra coverage and protection and the elasticated waist makes sure of a snug fit. With this kids' thermal set, your little one has the ideal outfit when combined with a warm fleece mid-layer and functional outerwear.

Base-layer set for juniors made from lightweight jersey with a stretchy finish. Wicks moisture effectively to the outer layers and keeps kids dry. Room to Grow: All Reima products run about one size larger than traditional US sizes so ordering your child’s current size is like ordering a size up. This base-layer set for juniors is one of our favorite new-season innovations. It's designed for little ones to wear when they're getting active. The new material has excellent moisture-wicking properties and feels really comfortable thanks to its stretchy finish. The flat seams won't chafe and the longer back hem gives extra coverage. With an elasticated waist on the trousers, they're guaranteed to fit perfectly. The lightweight material means the set's great for wearing all year round, whether during hockey matches or sports day races. Do not use detergents with bleaching agents. Do not use fabric softener.

title: Toddler Thermal Underwear & Long Johns
descriptionHtml:
Durability and Comfort Set us Apart

  • Our toddler long johns are warm, soft and made from a durable anti-pilling material to keep them looking great for longer
  • High-tech materials like Thermolite® maintain their insulation properties even when they’re wet—just right for days out making snow angels
  • Our clothes are designed to be lovingly passed down to the next member of the family—that’s why they’re made to last!

One-Piece Toddlers’ Thermals 

Our versatile thermals for toddlers will start off your little one’s daily adventure right. They bring together the heat-retaining and durability properties of Merino wool with high-performance fabrics like Tencel® and Thermolite®. 

Fleece thermal overalls are an ideal option for toddlers, with long zippers for easy diaper changes. And for extra cold days, find double-layered toddlers’ thermal underwear. 

Reima's Green Promise 

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

The key to a great day out is a solid foundation. Our toddler base layers are made from soft wool blends and high-tech lightweight material. They’re super-soft and have flat seams to keep toddlers warm and dry while exploring the outdoors. Pair your toddler’s thermal underwear with a soft fleece jacket in mild weather and a warm winter coat when the temperature drops. 

Shop our range of toddlers’ thermal underwear to find the ideal base for your toddlers’ outfit.

title: Shop all Toddlers Wool Clothing
descriptionHtml:
All About our Warming Wool Clothing for Toddlers

  • Wool is breathable, durable and hypoallergenic
  • Wool is sustainable too—so it’s good for the environment!
  • It keeps its heat-retention properties even when wet
  • Our unique blend of merino wool is soft and has enough stretch to allow for optimum movement 

All-day Fun in Wearable Wool 

From long forest walks to all-day skiing, our wool clothing for toddler boys and girls is made to be worn all day. The flat seams mean no chafing and there’s enough stretch to let little ones move freely. 


Stiff, scratchy wool? Not here! Our unique wool blends are soft and stretchy—perfect for active toddlers. Pants have elasticated waists for a comfortable fit and tops have longer hems at the back to prevent the cold from getting in. And our selection is available in a range of bright shades that are as sunny and your little one. 

[first_paragraph]

Shop our range of wool toddlers’ separates or find sets that work just as well under clothes or for lounging after a long day out.

title: All Toddlers Rainwear
descriptionHtml:

  • Highly reflective accents keep kids visible on dark nights 

Turn Gray Days Into Happy Days

Don’t let the rain keep you indoors. Our toddler raincoats and pants will help you and your little one make the most of rainy days. Reima’s toddlers’ waterproof jackets can be worn over a light top in mild weather and or with a warm fleece underneath on chilly days. 

Our toddler rain pants have convenient adjustable suspenders to keep them in place. And convenient foot loops keep the pants from bunching up inside rain boots. Now your little one is ready for puddle-splashing and mud pie-baking!

title: All Toddlers Tops
descriptionHtml:
What Sets our Tops for Toddlers Apart?

  • Knit-look tops have the feel of sweaters but perform like fleece
  • Moisture-wicking fabric, like Xylitol Cool, keeps active toddlers dry all-day
  • Longer back hems keep young children warm 
  • Our tops are easy to care for—just machine wash dry at room temperature
  • Swim shirts with SPF 50+ protection to allow your kids to stay out all-day

Top Tips for Dressing Your Toddler

Dressing toddlers can be challenging but out tops for toddler boys and girls make it a little easier. Bright colors and soft, comfortable material make for clothes they’ll want to wear again and again. Follow these tips to make mornings with a toddler a little easier.

  1. Toddlers love to assert their independence so offer them a vote. Take out a couple of tops and ask which they prefer—they’ll feel in control and proud to wear their choice. 
  2. Layers are your friends! A well-fitting base layer will keep moisture away from the skin.
  3. Pick your battles. Little ones can be stubborn and sometimes it’s OK to let them have their way. Just pack a sensible outfit, like our soft fleece toddler tops and some softshell pants for them to change into later.

[first_paragraph]

On family hikes and days out on the town, hours spent in a swimming pool or staying warm in a brisk wind, our collection of tops for toddlers will keep little ones warm and dry. Our easy-care range is comfortable and breathable, and the cheery colors are sure to brighten everyone’s mood. Shop our toddler tops made from soft fleece, cozy wool or lightweight synthetic material and protect your little one from the elements.

Our kids' jumper is made from a new anti-pilling and wrinkle-resistant material! The fabric is also moisture-wicking, stretchy and super comfortable to wear. Thanks to the handy Play Layers system, this mid-layer kids' zip-thru jacket can also be attached to many pieces of Reima outerwear.

This kids' jacket combines the warmth of wool with the softness of a brushed lining. The cosiest mid-layer you can get as the fabric is ideal for temperature control. This kids' wool jacket is a great companion for cold weather! Use it underneath a coat or on its own when your little one's indoors. The breathable material keeps your child warm but doesn't cause them to sweat, no matter how active they're being! The interior of the soft cardigan is brushed so it feels super soft against skin. Soft, flat seams feel comfortable and don't chafe. Decorative stitching gives a final stylish touch to this block-colour wool coat for kids.

title: Toddler T Shirts
descriptionHtml:
Easy-wear. Safe. Comfortable. 

  • Our Reima Green Line offers toddler shirts made from 100% organic cotton 
  • Adventurous toddlers stay safe in the sun with our UPF range
  • Our Play Jersey material is quick-dry and super soft! It’s also made with recycled plastic bottles so it’s good for the environment 

Made to Move

Toddlers are bundles of energy. That’s why our range of toddler shirts is made to move with them. They’re comfortable and stretchy, easy to care for and good for the environment, what’s not to love? Plus they come in fun patterns and colors to keep your active toddler stylish and comfortable from the playground to playdates, and from city walks and to country treks. 

Our toddler shirts are a great foundation for your little one’s outfit on milder days. Just layer with cozy fleece and you’re ready to go!

title: Toddler Dresses
descriptionHtml:
Dresses That Impress

  • Our toddler dresses are made with quick-drying, moisture-wicking materials to keep active toddlers cool outside
  • A UPF factor of up to 40+ keeps little one protected as they play in the sun 
  • We use eco-friendly materials like organic cotton and fabric made from recycled plastic bottles 

We’ll Show You What We’re Made Of

At Reima we believe that materials matter. We use safe, eco-friendly materials like our Play Jersey. It’s made from a 60-40 blend of cotton and recycled plastic bottles. It’s not just good for the environment—it’s functional too. Our Play Jersey fabric is easy to wash and dries quickly—just right for little ones who love wearing their favorite outfit over and over. 

Reima's Green Promise

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

Beachside frolics and ice-cream filled summer outings are never far with our collection of toddler summer dresses. With an easy, casual fit and playful prints, these dresses are sure to become warm-weather favorites. Shop the collection of summer dresses for toddlers below. For dresses sized 4T and larger, click here.

title: Toddler Outdoor Shoes
descriptionHtml:
Our Shoes Are a Step Ahead

  • Comfort is key—soft fabric lining and waterproof inserts keep little feet happy 

You Can Count on Reima

Reima has been making clothes and shoes for toddlers for 75 years so we know a thing or two about keeping kids warm, dry and comfortable. Our shoes that and more. Shorter shafts on boots won’t restrict little ones’ movement as they explore the outdoors and Velcro fastening lets toddlers feel independent.

Reima's Green Promise 

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

descriptionHtml:

title: All Toddlers Bottoms
descriptionHtml:
Built to play and made to last

We all want long-lasting toddler clothes that are also comfortable. Here’s how we get it right:

  • Fabric that moves! Our 4-way stretch material is quick-drying and resists dirt and water so little messes matter less!
  • On those hot days, our Xylitol Cool leggings keep little ones’ legs protected while also providing a pleasant cooling effect
  • Reima toddler jeans are made from a smart cotton blend that keeps active toddlers warm in the winter and cool in the summer. And they keep their color wash after wash!

Easy care for all-day wear

Our clothes are made to handle a little mess. Most of our toddler's bottoms are repel dirt and water but when it’s finally laundry time, machine washing them is a breeze. Just skip the fabric softener, which can damage the garment’s finish.

Reima's Green Promise

title: Toddlers Accessories
descriptionHtml:
What’s the Best Thing About Our Toddler Accessories? 

  • Everything! Our toddler winter accessories are made to withstand Nordic weather—waterproof mittens are insulated and brushed lining feels soft against toddlers’ sensitive skin
  • Materials matter! Find toddler beanies made from 100% merino wool
  • Our toddlers’ cold-weather accessories are PVC and fluorocarbon-free 

All-Weather Friends

Reima kids know that with the right gear all weather is good weather. Make the most of the great outdoors with our range of toddler accessories. Discover warm beanies and feather-light rain hats alongside waterproof gloves and softshell midseason styles. For extra cold days, keep toddlers toasty with a merino wool ski mask or a fleece neck warmer—perfect for a day out on the slopes. 

Reima's Green Promise 

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph] 

Complete your toddler’s outfit with the right accessories to get them ready for outdoor adventures. Find cozy, colorful socks, insulated baby booties, and windproof beanies that will make little ones glad to be outside. Shop the collection online at Reima.

title: Scarves & Neck Warmers for Toddlers
descriptionHtml:
What Sets Reima's Scarves & Neck warmers Apart

  • Material matters! We use fine Merino wool blends, super-soft fleece and our own Reimatec waterproof, breathable fabric for comfort and durability
  • Details are everything—baby booties have elasticated or drawstring ankles for extra protection against the cold and our scarves are soft and colorful
  • All our range is easy to care for—just put it in the washing machine and dry at room temperature 

From Finland With Love

Babies and toddlers need fresh air as much as older children do. In fact, did you know that in Finland babies and toddlers nap outdoors? Parents believe that their babies do their best napping wrapped up warm in a snowsuit and sleeping in a stroller. 

Our warm winter accessories are made to withstand Nordic temperatures so we know a thing or two about keeping little ones warm and comfortable in all weather. Shop the collection to find out more. 

Reima's Green Promise 

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

Put the finishing touches on your toddler’s outfit with our collection of toddlers’ scarves, and other accessories. Our colorful scarves and toddler neck warmers come in cheerful colors and soft materials that’ll bring a smile to your little one’s face. Shop Reima’s fun and functional range below.
