title: Gloves for Toddlers
descriptionHtml:
What Makes Our Toddler Gloves and Mittens Special? 

  • Soft fleece lining keeps hands toasty on outdoor adventures
  • Non-slip grips help little ones hold on to slippery surfaces
  • Reflective details keep kids safe and visible on dark winter nights

For Skiing, Snowball Fighting and Everything in Between!

Meet our ideal snowball-making mittens. They’re completely waterproof but have a soft fleece lining to keep small hands warm and cozy. The reinforced grips offer traction on slippery surfaces and also keep toddlers extra warm as they play with the snow. Handy zippers or Velcro tabs make it easy to dress wiggly toddlers and the choice of colors means there’s something for everyone. Don’t forget a hat on those frosty family outings!

For chilly days in the spring and fall, look to our softshell, touchscreen-friendly gloves. These super warm gloves are flexible, breathable and waterproof. What’s not to love?

Reima's Green Promise 

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

Curiosity comes naturally to toddlers. Encourage your little one to grab adventure with both hands with our collection of toddler gloves and mittens. Shop our popular Reimatec mittens, made from waterproof yet breathable material to keep little hands dry and warm. These winter mittens are made to fit snugly over jacket sleeves for maximum protection from the cold. Discover the collection below.

seo.title: Toddler Gloves | Reima US
seo.description: Reima's selection of gloves are made with the active toddler in mind. Comfortable and durable, our gloves are one of a kind. Shop today!

These children's waterproof mittens are made from a comfortable elasticated material and come with a robust polyester knit lining. These children's waterproof mittens are lined with knitted polyester for additional warmth and comfort. The welded seams help to make sure that they keep wetness away from skin. The flexible material doesn't harden in frost – with warm gloves underneath, these rain mittens for children can also be worn on colder days. They're made from a safe, PVC-free material with reflective details to keep kids seen when it's darker outside.

These kids' mittens are Reima classics. Completely water- and windproof. Warm, breathable and stretchy. These flexible and breathable Reimatec kids' mittens are best-sellers! They're lined with super lightweight, extra-warm PrimaLoft® insulation and are made from a windproof material with a waterproof Hipora insert to keep little ones' fingers warm and dry in all weather conditions! The warm fleece lining feels comfortable and cosy against skin. The reinforcements on the palms, thumbs and fingers mean kids can get a good grip on whatever they're holding (and definitely help with making snowballs)! Reflective details are part of the package, too. While the material is sturdy and dirt-repellent, these easy-care kids' winter mittens can also be tumble-dried. They come in a range of colours as well.

Babies' booties with lightweight wadding and a fleece lining. These lovely babies' booties are ideal for chilly winter days out in the pram. They have wadding and a soft fleece lining on the inside. Match them with adorable Talvik mittens to complete the look!

Unlined kids' waterproof mittens made from a flexible and PVC-free material. They come in a choice of colours. These unlined waterproof kids' mittens are made from a flexible, PVC-free material and come in a choice of colours. The welded seams help ensure that they keep little ones dry no matter how many puddles need to be splashed in. The elasticated band with a snap button on the wrist creates a snug fit.

Soft, flexible and breathable softshell gloves for kids. Made from a waterproof material with a dirt-repellent surface. Lined with a soft brushed knit. These water-repellent and breathable softshell kids' gloves are made from a durable material and have a water- and dirt-repellent surface. The fabric is also very stretchy. The forefinger and thumb tips are touch-screen friendly too, so there's no need for children to take the gloves off when calling home on their phone. The grippy surface on the palm is great for holding onto items. Lined with a soft brushed polyester knit, these touchscreen gloves are a superb choice.

Reimatec winter mittens for toddlers. Very warm PrimaLoft® insulation. Durable and water-resistant. The long zipper means they're easy to put on. Our new-and-improved toddlers' winter mittens with PrimaLoft® wadding are now even warmer. The soft and flexible material is also windproof yet manages to stay breathable for comfort. While these gloves are resistant to water, they're not fully waterproof so are best suited to dry and frosty winter days. For added warmth in the coldest temperatures we recommend wearing woollen mittens underneath. Thanks to the zipper, these gloves are easy to slip on little hands and the soft polyester knit lining feels comfortable against skin. Our dirt-resistant pair can also be tumble-dried, so they'll always be ready for fun adventures.

These toddlers and kids' mittens are made from a stretchy wool-mix knit that feels comfortable and keeps hands warm. Ideal under waterproof gloves. We love these Merino wool mittens! Our toddlers and kids' gloves are ideal underneath waterproof mittens for extra warmth. They feel comfortable and come in easy-to-wear colours.

Flexible and breathable softshell mittens for kids. Made from a waterproof material with a dirt-repellent surface. Lined with a brushed polyester knit. These breathable, waterproof kids' mittens are made from a durable softshell material and have a dirt-repellent surface. The fabric is very stretchy. Lined with a soft brushed polyester knit, these kids' waterproof mittens in black are a great choice for when little ones are heading outside. The grippy surface on the palms allows children to hold onto things tightly.

These babies' mittens come with lightweight wadding and a fleece lining. These lovely babies' mittens are ideal for chilly winter days out in the pram. They have a padded soft fleece lining for extra warmth. Match them with our adorable Tepasto booties to complete the look!

Reimatec fully reflective kids' mittens. Fully waterproof, windproof and breathable. Lined with soft fleece. Reima proudly presents these reflective mittens! Our gloves are made from a reflective fabric, so they help improve your little one's safety when it's dark out! The waterproof, windproof and breathable material is made up of lightweight but extra warm PrimaLoft® wadding and a waterproof Hipora insert. Lined with fleece, these mittens also feel soft and cosy against skin. The reinforcements on the palm and thumb are durable and give little ones a good grip. These gloves are a real must-have for winter! They're also CE certified, so they meet health, safety and environmental protection standards. title: Toddler Socks
descriptionHtml:
What Makes Our Toddler Socks Great?

  • Merino wool is soft, durable and retains heat even when it’s wet
  • High-tech synthetic material is blended with natural fibers to increase their durability and moisture-transfer properties
  • Our winter socks for toddlers have reinforced toes and heels for extra comfort and our ski socks are lined with terrycloth so they feel soft against sensitive skin

Our Green Promise

At Reima we believe that what’s good for our kids is good for the planet. That’s why we work with only trusted suppliers and use sustainable processes and materials in our products. It’s also why our children’s and toddlers’ clothing is made without PVC, fluorocarbons or other harmful materials.   

Reima's Green Promise 

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

Keep your tiny explorer’s toes toasty on cold-weather treks with our collection of toddlers’ socks. Find warm socks for toddlers in cotton and wool blends that will wick away moisture while retaining heat. Our thick wool socks for toddlers are the perfect complement to ski boots and snowshoes. Shop the range below.

seo.title: Toddler Socks: Wool, Winter & Summer Socks | Reima US
seo.description: Reima's socks are made with the active toddler in mind. Perfect for any season, shop both summer and winter wool socks today!

These warm Merino-blend kids' wool socks with a terry lining are fantastic for downhill skiing. These colourful Merino-blend kids' long socks have a soft terry inside so they're perfect for wearing inside ski boots. Warm yet quick drying and with a reinforced sole, heel and toes, they're both fun and functional.

Lightweight kids' socks made from flexible materials. Perfect for wearing with trainers on summer days. 2-pack. These cheery kids' socks are comfortable to wear because they're light and stretchy. They come in a fun set of two different pairs!

These wool-blend kids' Merino socks are super warm. They have a terry lining and are great for cross-country skiing. These Merino wool-mix kids' socks are the perfect choice for cold and rainy days. The soft terry interior gives warmth, especially when worn inside wellies. These socks are also quick-drying. Reinforcements in the soles, heels and toes mean they're long-lasting as well.

Lightweight juniors' down jacket with a dirt- and water-repellent finish. Made from a breathable material. Perfect for city trips in the autumn. Straight cut. This juniors' down jacket is made from a water-repellent, windproof and breathable material. With its smooth lining and a handy two-way zip, it's easy to slip on. It has a safe, detachable hood and also comes with a separate bag for storage. This luxuriously lightweight and warm kids' jacket is an on-trend choice for playtime or trips to town.

Lightweight juniors' down jacket with a dirt- and water-repellent finish. Made from a breathable material. Perfect for city trips in autumn. Fitted shape. This juniors' down jacket is made from a water-repellent, windproof and breathable material. With a smooth lining and handy two-way zipper, the design is easy to slip on. It's finished with a safe detachable hood. The jacket comes with a separate bag for storage. Luxurious and lightweight, this jacket is an on-trend choice for strolls in the city!

Super popular waterproof Reimatec kids' boots for the mid-season and mild winters. Machine washable at cold temperatures. Each pair has elasticated laces. Our super popular, waterproof Reimatec kids' boots are machine washable at cold temperatures! Equipped with a seam-sealed insert and textile lining, the upper is made from durable nylon and the toes are reinforced with soft microfibre. These boots for kids also come with elasticated laces that are easy to use. Each pair has removable insoles with Reima's own Happy Fit print to help you find the correct size, too. Reflective details and new cheery colours mean they're fun to match with our outerwear and other kids' accessories.

Functional all-in-one for toddlers made from a warm knit fleece. Striking all-over print and long ribbed cuffs. Very cosy and quick-drying. This toddlers' all-in-one is made from a soft mélange fleece and comes in a fun sporty print. The design is perfect for early autumn or as a mid-layer in winter.

Reimatec fully waterproof toddlers' snowsuit in a block colour with a detachable faux-fur-trimmed hood. Long zipper for easy dressing and an insulated seat. Features Play Layers. This toddlers' easy-care snowsuit is ideal for all kinds of winter fun. It's made from a breathable and windproof material that also repels dirt. All its seams are sealed for a waterproof finish and the insulated seat keeps bottoms warm and dry during cold-weather adventures. The smooth polyester lining makes dressing easy. Many Reima items can be attached to the overall thanks to the handy Play Layers snap-button system. The removable and adjustable hood adds safety when kids are playing outdoors. Attached with snap buttons, it comes off easily if it gets caught on something. Durable silicone foot loops keep the trouser hems in place, protecting little ankles from moisture and the cold. This tumble-dryer-friendly winter classic is a top choice for crawling in the snow or walking in the city alike!

title: Reflective Clothing
descriptionHtml:
[first_paragraph]

Reima wins first prize for product safety

The European Union has awarded Reima as the best in children's product safety. Safety runs deep in Reima's DNA - it is the basis of everything we do.

We received the award for ensuring that our clothes are not only safe for children but offer extra protection by enhancing visibility in the dark & artic grip soles for extra grip in slippery weather.

seo.title: Reflective Clothing - Reima US
seo.description: Be seen in the dark! Reima's reflective all-over prints make sure your kids get noticed in the dark, fog, snow, or any other times with poor visibility. Our reflective clothing recently won first prize in the European Union for children's product safety.

Reimatec kids' warm winter snowsuit with reflective details. Fully water- and windproof as well as breathable. Fitted design. title: All Toddlers Swimwear
descriptionHtml:
Here’s why we love our toddler swimwear

  • Our UPF 50+ SunProof line of toddler swimwear protects little ones from the sun 
  • Non-nano titanium dioxide is spun deep into the fabric so it stays put wash after wash
  • Made from recycled materials, our toddler swimwear is also good for the planet
  • Flat seams mean extra comfort for long days at the beach or pool

Slather up and cover-up! Our tips for staying safe in the sun

Keep your little adventurers protected as they play in the sun, with our tried and true tips for a worry-free day out. 

  • Have a trusted sunscreen in your day bag for easy access and touch-ups throughout the day.
  • When possible choose a mineral sunscreen, which is not only gentler on delicate skin but kinder to marine life too
  •  Look at the ingredients and opt for formulas without nanoparticles, which can be absorbed by the skin
  •  Don’t forget to check the expiration date on your sunblock to ensure maximum protection

Clothing with an ultraviolet protection factor, or UPF, is another great way to shield your family from the sun on long days out. Keep a long-sleeved top and sun hat in your bag or in the car for easy sun protection on the go!

Reima's Green Promise

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next. 

[first_paragraph] Gear up your little one for bright days by the pool with our sunny toddler swimwear. Our toddler girl rash guards, boys swimming trunks, and one-piece swimsuits are as cool as they are easy to wear, with chafe-free seams, comfortable fits, and mood-boosting prints. Shop the toddler swimwear collection below.

seo.description: Highly protective toddlers' sunhat with advanced UV coverage. Has a long, wide brim and stylish visor. A toddlers' hat is a key accessory for sunny weather. This lighter style with no lining is made from a stretchy material that has a UV 50+ protection factor. The visor protect the face and the back brim keeps the neck out of the sun.

A kids' all-in-one swimsuit for water babies. Made from quick-drying and breathable material. Features high UV sun protection. This SunProof swimsuit for kids is designed for fun in the water and on the beach. The design gives effective coverage from harmful rays all the way to the elbows and knees with its UV protection factor of 50+. title: Toddlers Swim Shirts & Rash Guards
descriptionHtml:
Meet our SunProof line 

  • Our UPF 50+ toddler rash guards are made using recycled plastic bottles so they’re good for the environment while still being soft and comfortable to wear
  • Titanium dioxide is spun into the fabric so it doesn’t come off even after long days at the beach or pool, all while being completely safe for your children.
  • Safety is important to us so there are no nanoparticles or harmful chemicals in our toddler rash guard swim shirts 

What’s better than looking for hidden treasure in the sand? Knowing that your little ones are protected from the sun! Look to our SunProof collection for toddler rash guards and swim shorts with superior UPF50+ protection for more peace of mind on those sunny days at the beach. And don't forget your sunhat to keep you protected all day.

Reima's Green Promise

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

The sound of laughter. Sandy fingers and toes. That’s what beach days are about. Our toddler rash guard swim shirts keep splashy toddlers happy in and out of the water with superior sun protection. A longer hem at the back gives extra coverage and mood-boosting colors will bring a smile to your face. Shop the collection now.

title: Toddler Swim Shorts & Swim Trunks
descriptionHtml:
Toddler Boys’ and Girls Swimming Trunks

Impromptu pool days are even brighter with our SunProof toddler swim trunks. Here’s why you’ll want to stock up on these warm-weather essentials. 

  • An eco-friendly choice, these toddler swim trunks are made using fabric made from recycled plastic bottles 
  • The drawstring waist and snug fit around the legs mean no leaks!
  • Our UPF 50+ toddler girl and boy swim shorts offer superior sun protection for even more fun in the sun 

Discover Reima SunProof 

At Reima we’re committed to helping children everywhere enjoy the sun safely. Our SunProof line does just that with our UPF 50+ material. SunProof toddler sun hats, swimsuits and rash guards are made using a special process that spins non-nano titanium dioxide deep into the garment’s fibers. This means your child’s swimwear will maintain its protective properties use after use. 

Reima's Green Promise

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph] 

Sandy beachside fun and summer pool gatherings call for the right gear and these cheery toddler swim trunks are just the ticket. In colorful combinations that will delight boys and girls, our toddler swimming trunks are also made with our SunProof UPF 50+ fabric for extra sun protection. Find your toddler’s new favorite swimming trunks in our collection below.

seo.description: Reima's selection of swim trunks and swim shorts are made for summer days and active toddlers. Shop our full collection online today!

Quick-drying and breathable toddlers' swimming trunks with an adjustable waist and high UV protection. An eco-friendly choice. These classic swimming shorts for kids are ideal for keeping children playing on the beach and in the water for longer. The material has a UV sun protection factor of 50+, giving effective coverage for delicate skin all the way to the knees. The adjustable, elasticated waist ensures a good fit and combines with the stretchy lining on the front of these kids' swim shorts for comfort. This is also an ecological choice, as part of the fiber content comes from used PET beverage bottles.

A leakproof lining and snug fit means little ones can splash about carefree in these toddler and babies' swimming trunks. An eco-friendly choice. For a carefree baby or toddler swimming session, we strongly recommend these 'diaper' trunks! Made from SunProof material, these UV 50+ summer shorts provide effective protection against harmful rays. They're suitable for both the pool and beach. A snug fit around the legs and waist combined with a leak-proof lining prevent unwanted surprises. The elasticated waist can also be adjusted for comfort and an individual fit. This is also an ecological choice, as part of the fiber content comes from used PET beverage bottles.

title: Toddler Hiking & Softshell Pants
descriptionHtml:
What makes our toddler softshell pants great?

  • Elasticated waists and cuffs keep cold and moisture out but a breathable top layer means sweat stays at bay
  • The fleece lining makes them super comfortable and easy to wear
  • These mid-season softshell pants are easy to care for. Just machine wash them and hang to dry

For indoors and outdoors

Unstoppable toddlers need clothes that accompany them on their great hiking adventures. Luckily, our softshell pants are just right for the job. They perform like snow pants but are as easy to wear like sweat pants. These instant classics will go great with a cozy fleece jacket on casual outings. Add a rain jacket and your toddler will be ready for any weather! What’s not to like? 

Reima's Green Promise

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

Say hello to your toddler’s new everyday pants. They’re as comfy as pajamas but don’t let that fool you—these toddlers’ softshell pants were made for the outdoors. They’re warm, but light and soft but water and windproof. Shop our collection of cozy softshell toddler softshell pants below.

title: Toddler Union Suits
descriptionHtml:
What Sets our Toddler Union Suits Apart? 

Our toddler union suits offer the perfect blend of comfort and functionality. Here’s why it’s sure to become your toddler’s new favorite:

  • Handy zippers make it easy for little ones to dress themselves
  • Merino wool blends and innovative thermal fabrics help regulate your toddler’s temperature
  • Our toddler union suits are easy to care for—just machine wash on a low temperature using a gentle detergent and no fabric softener

Wool vs Synthetic: What’s the best Union Suit for your Toddler?

Our union suits and base layers come in different materials. High-performance synthetics like THERMOLITE® are quick-drying and retain their insulation properties even when they’re wet, making them perfect for activities like skiing. 

When it comes to warmth, however, wool is a winner—perfect for low-impact activities like hiking in cold weather. Because toddlers aren’t able to regulate their own body temperature as well as adults and older kids, our Merino wool blend union suits are perfect toddlers. A mix of synthetic fibers and wool allows our toddler union suits to dry more quickly for a perfect blend of warmth and performance. It’s a win-win!

Reima's Green Promise

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph]

Comfort and functionality come together in our cozy, comfortable toddler union suits. These one-pieces can be worn as a mid-layer under a snowsuit on cold weather outings but are also perfect as loungewear after a busy day exploring the outdoors. Choose from materials like soft merino wool and functional knit fleece. Shop our cozy collection of toddler union suits below.

title: Toddler Sun Hats
descriptionHtml:
The Low Down on Toddler Sun Hats

The outdoors are yours to explore. Keep your little one safe from the sun with our versatile sun hats.

  • Our UPF 50+ toddler sun hats offer maximum sun protection yet are lightweight enough to be worn all-day
  • Laser-cut ventilation holes keep little ones cool in the sun
  • Styles with long back brims offer extra protection from harmful rays

Meet Reima SunProof

At Reima our mission is to help all children enjoy the outdoors. We achieve that with clothing that keeps kids safe and comfortable on their daily adventures. Our SunProof line offers non-toxic, durable sun protection so both parents and little ones can have more carefree time outside. 

It all starts with innovative material. Our SunProof swimwear including swimsuits and rashguards are made using a special fabric that incorporates non-nano titanium dioxide deep into the fibers. This means the sun protection lasts wash after wash.

Reima Green Promise

We care about the environment and know you do too. That’s why we don’t use harmful chemicals like fluorocarbons in our clothes, resulting in safer products for your children. What’s more, our high-quality products are made to last, meaning a beloved item can be passed down from one child to the next.

[first_paragraph] 

Sunny days call for extra protection from harmful rays. Our toddler sun hats will keep little explorers covered up on their outdoor treks so they can spend more time outside.

Find the hat that’s right for your toddler—from fun reversible bucket styles to super-light caps, all our hats are made with little ones in mind. Shop our collection of light and bright toddler sun hats below.

seo.title: Wapusk | Kids Fleece Hoodie | Reima US
seo.description: Our Wapusk fleece hoodie is a longline fleece hoodie with a big front pocket. Very comfortable to wear as it feels soft against your skin. Super warm during colder winter days. The kangaroo pocket means children will have somewhere to keep their hands warm.

Reimatec fully reflective kids' mittens. Fully waterproof, windproof and breathable. Lined with soft fleece. Reima proudly presents these reflective mittens! Our gloves are made from a reflective fabric, so they help improve your little one's safety when it's dark out! The waterproof, windproof and breathable material is made up of lightweight but extra warm PrimaLoft® wadding and a waterproof Hipora insert. Lined with fleece, these mittens also feel soft and cosy against skin. The reinforcements on the palm and thumb are durable and give little ones a good grip. These gloves are a real must-have for winter! They're also CE certified, so they meet health, safety and environmental protection standards. [product][info] Toddlers' and kids' winter mittens Waterproof insert Reinforced palm and thumb Full lining: soft, warm fleece Reima logo badge at side Warm PrimaLoft® insulation Material is reflective and the product has been certified as personal protective equipment To ensure visibility, the mitten should be dressed over the sleeve. When worn over the sleeve, these reflective mittens can help drivers of motor vehicles equipped with headlights detect the child in conditions of poor visibility. If the mitten becomes very dirty, visibility may be affected. [product][mats] Material:65% polyester, 35% cotton Coating: [product][care] Care label instructions: Wash separately. Do not pull the lining out from the mitten. Do not use detergents with bleaching agents. Do not use fabric softener. Tumble drying or drying cabinet allowed (max. 40 °C). Waterproof, windproof and breathable structure and fleece lining. Good reflective details. Perfect for active outings! These Reimatec kids' winter mittens come with top functions! The waterproof, windproof and breathable structure consist of lightweight, but extra warm PrimaLoft® wadding and waterproof Hipora insert. Lined with fleece, the mittens feel soft and cozy against the skin. The reinforcements on the palm, thumb, and tip of the mittens are durable and give a good grip. Reflecting details are part of the package, of course. After washing, the mittens can be tumble-dried for the next outdoor adventures.

Waterproof Reimatec shoes are made of synthetic material and textile and the outsole is thermoplastic rubber. Seam-sealed insert, mesh lining and to help to find the correct size removable Happy Fit insoles. These shoes are perfect for both outdoors and school days, and after an adventure you can put these in the washing machine (delicate 30° C) and they are as good as new again!
